title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-6.4 - Fee mitigation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-6.4 - Fee mitigation

State Regulations

The Commissioner of General Services, in determining the
fee to be charged, may negotiate a more flexible payment schedule and otherwise
mitigate fees based upon factors such as public access, surrender of prior

State grants pursuant to section
76
of the

Public Lands Law, preservation of open space or other actual public benefits as
determined by the commissioner with the approval of the State

Comptroller. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
270-6.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
